messages.subject: Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Friends, I ve been in Chicago on personal business since late Thursday. Heading back home today, but in no hurry to drive out, so I have a free day. Is
messages.messageBody:
Dear Friends,

I've been in Chicago on personal business since late Thursday. Heading
back home today, but in no hurry to drive out, so I have a free day. Is
there any really good nihonto collection in a local museum that would
be worth visiting today? I'm completely ignorant of what Chicago has to
offer in this sense. I'll check email within the next couple of hours
(it is 7:30 CT as I write this) for any responses.

Domo arigato!!!

Best Regards,

Andres Pedraza
